title: CachingDirectoryFactory calls close(Directory) on forceNew if the Directory has a refCnt of 0, but it should call closeDirectory(CacheValueValue)

SOLR-4597: Additional work.

SOLR-4598: The Core Admin unload command's option 'deleteDataDir', should use the DirectoryFactory API to remove the data dir.
